issue.title: [JS] Typings should be a regular dependency
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2044](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2044). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently some typings (`@types/node` and `@types/flatbuffers`) are devDependencies rather than dependencies, which prevents `.d.ts` files from being understood in downstream projects.
